title: 自我整合包
author: wkyyzhb
txt_content:
突发奇想做整合包，然后整合好准备实验，结果崩溃，请问这货是什么意思（估摸着是id问题吧，没加flan’mod以前能正常运转）

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game
A full error report has been saved to E:\minecraft\游戏本体\1.4.7-NICK科技整合-客户端V2.1.0 - 副本\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-03_21.06.31-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
做整合包。。。。。。

好歹看懂错误文件在哪吧
